name: Brainscapes
description:
Brain!

The main task of the player is "Strain your brains" - pass the runner's trivia quiz.

You play as the Brain who is trying to escape from the Zomboos by jumping, and in order to jump, he needs to answer the questions correctly.

Zomboos - opponents are trying by any means to catch the Brain and EAT!

Features of Brainscapes: Quiz Trivia Runner:

* Fun quiz in a new format!

* Thousands of unique questions!

* Hundreds of customization options!

* Dozens of different levels!

* Hundreds of different enemies!

* Dozens of different brains with unique abilities. and for those who do not need them - there is a golden brain!

Save your brain from zombies! Become the smartest brain and don't get eaten in Brainscapes: Trivia quiz runner trivia!

This game is part of the Totem network of games. Use your unique Totem Avatars in the game for exclusive features.

Don't have an Avatar yet? Get one for free through the Totem Explorer website!
